51constexpr GLuint kInitialMaxLevel = 1000;
52
53bool IsMipmapFiltered(GLenum minFilterMode);
54
55// Convert a given filter mode to nearest filtering.
56GLenum ConvertToNearestFilterMode(GLenum filterMode);
57
58// Convert a given filter mode to nearest mip filtering.
59GLenum ConvertToNearestMipFilterMode(GLenum filterMode);
60
61struct ImageDesc final
62{
63 ImageDesc();
64 ImageDesc(const Extents &size, const Format &format, const InitState initState);
65 ImageDesc(const Extents &size,
66 const Format &format,
67 const GLsizei samples,
68 const bool fixedSampleLocations,
69 const InitState initState);
70
71 ImageDesc(const ImageDesc &other) = default;
72 ImageDesc &operator=(const ImageDesc &other) = default;
73
74 GLint getMemorySize() const;
75
76 Extents size;
77 Format format;
78 GLsizei samples;
79 bool fixedSampleLocations;
80
81 // Needed for robust resource initialization.
82 InitState initState;
83};
84
85struct SwizzleState final
86{
87 SwizzleState();
88 SwizzleState(GLenum red, GLenum green, GLenum blue, GLenum alpha);
89 SwizzleState(const SwizzleState &other) = default;
90 SwizzleState &operator=(const SwizzleState &other) = default;
91
92 bool swizzleRequired() const;
93
94 bool operator==(const SwizzleState &other) const;
95 bool operator!=(const SwizzleState &other) const;
96
97 GLenum swizzleRed;
98 GLenum swizzleGreen;
99 GLenum swizzleBlue;
100 GLenum swizzleAlpha;
101};
102
103// State from Table 6.9 (state per texture object) in the OpenGL ES 3.0.2 spec.
104class TextureState final : private angle::NonCopyable
105{
106 public:
107 TextureState(TextureType type);
108 ~TextureState();
109
110 bool swizzleRequired() const;
111 GLuint getEffectiveBaseLevel() const;
112 GLuint getEffectiveMaxLevel() const;
113
114 // Returns the value called "q" in the GLES 3.0.4 spec section 3.8.10.
115 GLuint getMipmapMaxLevel() const;
116
117 // Returns true if base level changed.
118 bool setBaseLevel(GLuint baseLevel);
119 GLuint getBaseLevel() const { return mBaseLevel; }
120 bool setMaxLevel(GLuint maxLevel);
121 GLuint getMaxLevel() const { return mMaxLevel; }
122
123 bool isCubeComplete() const;
124
125 ANGLE_INLINE bool compatibleWithSamplerFormat(SamplerFormat format,
126 const SamplerState &samplerState) const
127 {
128 if (!mCachedSamplerFormatValid ||
129 mCachedSamplerCompareMode != samplerState.getCompareMode())
130 {
131 mCachedSamplerFormat = computeRequiredSamplerFormat(samplerState);
132 mCachedSamplerCompareMode = samplerState.getCompareMode();
133 mCachedSamplerFormatValid = true;
134 }
135 // Incomplete textures are compatible with any sampler format.
136 return mCachedSamplerFormat == SamplerFormat::InvalidEnum || format == mCachedSamplerFormat;
137 }
138
139 const ImageDesc &getImageDesc(TextureTarget target, size_t level) const;
140 const ImageDesc &getImageDesc(const ImageIndex &imageIndex) const;
141
142 TextureType getType() const { return mType; }
143 const SwizzleState &getSwizzleState() const { return mSwizzleState; }
144 const SamplerState &getSamplerState() const { return mSamplerState; }
145 GLenum getUsage() const { return mUsage; }
146 GLenum getDepthStencilTextureMode() const { return mDepthStencilTextureMode; }
147 bool isStencilMode() const { return mDepthStencilTextureMode == GL_STENCIL_INDEX; }
148
149 bool hasBeenBoundAsImage() const { return mHasBeenBoundAsImage; }
150
151 gl::SrgbOverride getSRGBOverride() const { return mSrgbOverride; }
152
153 // Returns the desc of the base level. Only valid for cube-complete/mip-complete textures.
154 const ImageDesc &getBaseLevelDesc() const;
155
156 // GLES1 emulation: For GL_OES_draw_texture
157 void setCrop(const Rectangle &rect);
158 const Rectangle &getCrop() const;
159
160 // GLES1 emulation: Auto-mipmap generation is a texparameter
161 void setGenerateMipmapHint(GLenum hint);
162 GLenum getGenerateMipmapHint() const;
163
164 // Return the enabled mipmap level count.
165 GLuint getEnabledLevelCount() const;
166
167 bool getImmutableFormat() const { return mImmutableFormat; }
168 GLuint getImmutableLevels() const { return mImmutableLevels; }
169
170 const std::vector<ImageDesc> &getImageDescs() const { return mImageDescs; }
171
172 InitState getInitState() const { return mInitState; }
173
174 private:
175 // Texture needs access to the ImageDesc functions.
176 friend class Texture;
177 // TODO(jmadill): Remove TextureGL from friends.
178 friend class rx::TextureGL;
179 friend bool operator==(const TextureState &a, const TextureState &b);
180
181 bool computeSamplerCompleteness(const SamplerState &samplerState, const State &state) const;
182 bool computeMipmapCompleteness() const;
183 bool computeLevelCompleteness(TextureTarget target, size_t level) const;
184 SamplerFormat computeRequiredSamplerFormat(const SamplerState &samplerState) const;
185
186 TextureTarget getBaseImageTarget() const;
187
188 void setImageDesc(TextureTarget target, size_t level, const ImageDesc &desc);
189 void setImageDescChain(GLuint baselevel,
190 GLuint maxLevel,
191 Extents baseSize,
192 const Format &format,
193 InitState initState);
194 void setImageDescChainMultisample(Extents baseSize,
195 const Format &format,
196 GLsizei samples,
197 bool fixedSampleLocations,
198 InitState initState);
199
200 void clearImageDesc(TextureTarget target, size_t level);
201 void clearImageDescs();
202
203 const TextureType mType;
204
205 SwizzleState mSwizzleState;
206
207 SamplerState mSamplerState;
208
209 SrgbOverride mSrgbOverride;
210
211 GLuint mBaseLevel;
212 GLuint mMaxLevel;
213
214 GLenum mDepthStencilTextureMode;
215
216 bool mHasBeenBoundAsImage;
217
218 bool mImmutableFormat;
219 GLuint mImmutableLevels;
220
221 // From GL_ANGLE_texture_usage
222 GLenum mUsage;
223
224 std::vector<ImageDesc> mImageDescs;
225
226 // GLES1 emulation: Texture crop rectangle
227 // For GL_OES_draw_texture
228 Rectangle mCropRect;
229
230 // GLES1 emulation: Generate-mipmap hint per texture
231 GLenum mGenerateMipmapHint;
232
233 // GL_OES_texture_buffer / GLES3.2
234 OffsetBindingPointer<Buffer> mBuffer;
235
236 InitState mInitState;
237
238 mutable SamplerFormat mCachedSamplerFormat;
239 mutable GLenum mCachedSamplerCompareMode;
240 mutable bool mCachedSamplerFormatValid;
241};
242
243bool operator==(const TextureState &a, const TextureState &b);
244bool operator!=(const TextureState &a, const TextureState &b);
245
246class Texture final : public RefCountObject<TextureID>,
247 public egl::ImageSibling,
248 public LabeledObject
249{
250 public:
251 Texture(rx::GLImplFactory *factory, TextureID id, TextureType type);
252 ~Texture() override;
253
254 void onDestroy(const Context *context) override;
255
256 void setLabel(const Context *context, const std::string &label) override;
257 const std::string &getLabel() const override;
258
259 TextureType getType() const { return mState.mType; }
260
261 void setSwizzleRed(const Context *context, GLenum swizzleRed);
262 GLenum getSwizzleRed() const;
263
264 void setSwizzleGreen(const Context *context, GLenum swizzleGreen);
265 GLenum getSwizzleGreen() const;
266
267 void setSwizzleBlue(const Context *context, GLenum swizzleBlue);
268 GLenum getSwizzleBlue() const;
269
270 void setSwizzleAlpha(const Context *context, GLenum swizzleAlpha);
271 GLenum getSwizzleAlpha() const;
272
273 void setMinFilter(const Context *context, GLenum minFilter);
274 GLenum getMinFilter() const;
275
276 void setMagFilter(const Context *context, GLenum magFilter);
277 GLenum getMagFilter() const;
278
279 void setWrapS(const Context *context, GLenum wrapS);
280 GLenum getWrapS() const;
281
282 void setWrapT(const Context *context, GLenum wrapT);
283 GLenum getWrapT() const;
284
285 void setWrapR(const Context *context, GLenum wrapR);
286 GLenum getWrapR() const;
287
288 void setMaxAnisotropy(const Context *context, float maxAnisotropy);
289 float getMaxAnisotropy() const;
290
291 void setMinLod(const Context *context, GLfloat minLod);
292 GLfloat getMinLod() const;
293
294 void setMaxLod(const Context *context, GLfloat maxLod);
295 GLfloat getMaxLod() const;
296
297 void setCompareMode(const Context *context, GLenum compareMode);
298 GLenum getCompareMode() const;
299
300 void setCompareFunc(const Context *context, GLenum compareFunc);
301 GLenum getCompareFunc() const;
302
303 void setSRGBDecode(const Context *context, GLenum sRGBDecode);
304 GLenum getSRGBDecode() const;
305
306 void setSRGBOverride(const Context *context, GLenum sRGBOverride);
307 GLenum getSRGBOverride() const;
308
309 const SamplerState &getSamplerState() const;
310
311 angle::Result setBaseLevel(const Context *context, GLuint baseLevel);
312 GLuint getBaseLevel() const;
313
314 void setMaxLevel(const Context *context, GLuint maxLevel);
315 GLuint getMaxLevel() const;
316
317 void setDepthStencilTextureMode(const Context *context, GLenum mode);
318 GLenum getDepthStencilTextureMode() const;
319
320 bool getImmutableFormat() const;
321
322 GLuint getImmutableLevels() const;
323
324 void setUsage(const Context *context, GLenum usage);
325 GLenum getUsage() const;
326
327 const TextureState &getState() const { return mState; }
328
329 void setBorderColor(const Context *context, const ColorGeneric &color);
330 const ColorGeneric &getBorderColor() const;
331
332 angle::Result setBuffer(const Context *context,
333 gl::Buffer *buffer,
334 GLenum internalFormat,
335 GLintptr offset,
336 GLsizeiptr size);
337 const OffsetBindingPointer<Buffer> &getBuffer() const;
338
339 const TextureState &getTextureState() const;
340
341 const Extents &getExtents(TextureTarget target, size_t level) const;
342 size_t getWidth(TextureTarget target, size_t level) const;
343 size_t getHeight(TextureTarget target, size_t level) const;
344 size_t getDepth(TextureTarget target, size_t level) const;
345 GLsizei getSamples(TextureTarget target, size_t level) const;
346 bool getFixedSampleLocations(TextureTarget target, size_t level) const;
347 const Format &getFormat(TextureTarget target, size_t level) const;
348
349 // Returns the value called "q" in the GLES 3.0.4 spec section 3.8.10.
350 GLuint getMipmapMaxLevel() const;
351
352 bool isMipmapComplete() const;

504 angle::Result getTexImage(const Context *context,

506 Buffer *packBuffer,
507 TextureTarget target,

512
513 rx::TextureImpl *getImplementation() const { return mTexture; }
514
515 // FramebufferAttachmentObject implementation
516 Extents getAttachmentSize(const ImageIndex &imageIndex) const override;
517 Format getAttachmentFormat(GLenum binding, const ImageIndex &imageIndex) const override;

520 GLenum binding,
521 const ImageIndex &imageIndex) const override;
522
523 bool getAttachmentFixedSampleLocations(const ImageIndex &imageIndex) const;
524
525 // GLES1 emulation
526 void setCrop(const Rectangle &rect);
527 const Rectangle &getCrop() const;
528 void setGenerateMipmapHint(GLenum generate);
529 GLenum getGenerateMipmapHint() const;
530
531 void onAttach(const Context *context, rx::Serial framebufferSerial) override;
532 void onDetach(const Context *context, rx::Serial framebufferSerial) override;
533
534 // Used specifically for FramebufferAttachmentObject.
535 GLuint getId() const override;
536
537 GLuint getNativeID() const;
538
539 // Needed for robust resource init.
540 angle::Result ensureInitialized(const Context *context);
541 InitState initState(const ImageIndex &imageIndex) const override;
542 InitState initState() const { return mState.mInitState; }
543 void setInitState(const ImageIndex &imageIndex, InitState initState) override;
544 void setInitState(InitState initState);
545
546 bool isBoundToFramebuffer(rx::Serial framebufferSerial) const
547 {
548 for (size_t index = 0; index < mBoundFramebufferSerials.size(); ++index)
549 {
550 if (mBoundFramebufferSerials[index] == framebufferSerial)
551 return true;
552 }
553
554 return false;
555 }
556
557 bool isDepthOrStencil() const
558 {
559 return mState.getBaseLevelDesc().format.info->isDepthOrStencil();
560 }
561
562 enum DirtyBitType
563 {
564 // Sampler state
565 DIRTY_BIT_MIN_FILTER,
566 DIRTY_BIT_MAG_FILTER,
567 DIRTY_BIT_WRAP_S,
568 DIRTY_BIT_WRAP_T,
569 DIRTY_BIT_WRAP_R,
570 DIRTY_BIT_MAX_ANISOTROPY,
571 DIRTY_BIT_MIN_LOD,
572 DIRTY_BIT_MAX_LOD,
573 DIRTY_BIT_COMPARE_MODE,
574 DIRTY_BIT_COMPARE_FUNC,
575 DIRTY_BIT_SRGB_DECODE,
576 DIRTY_BIT_SRGB_OVERRIDE,
577 DIRTY_BIT_BORDER_COLOR,
578
579 // Texture state
580 DIRTY_BIT_SWIZZLE_RED,
581 DIRTY_BIT_SWIZZLE_GREEN,
582 DIRTY_BIT_SWIZZLE_BLUE,
583 DIRTY_BIT_SWIZZLE_ALPHA,
584 DIRTY_BIT_BASE_LEVEL,
585 DIRTY_BIT_MAX_LEVEL,
586 DIRTY_BIT_DEPTH_STENCIL_TEXTURE_MODE,
587
588 // Image state
589 DIRTY_BIT_BOUND_AS_IMAGE,
590
591 // Misc
592 DIRTY_BIT_LABEL,
593 DIRTY_BIT_USAGE,
594 DIRTY_BIT_IMPLEMENTATION,
595
596 DIRTY_BIT_COUNT,
597 };
598 using DirtyBits = angle::BitSet<DIRTY_BIT_COUNT>;
599
600 angle::Result syncState(const Context *context, Command source);
601 bool hasAnyDirtyBit() const { return mDirtyBits.any(); }
602
603 // ObserverInterface implementation.
604 void onSubjectStateChange(angle::SubjectIndex index, angle::SubjectMessage message) override;
605
606 private:
607 rx::FramebufferAttachmentObjectImpl *getAttachmentImpl() const override;
608
609 // ANGLE-only method, used internally
610 friend class egl::Surface;
611 angle::Result bindTexImageFromSurface(Context *context, egl::Surface *surface);
612 angle::Result releaseTexImageFromSurface(const Context *context);
613
614 // ANGLE-only methods, used internally
615 friend class egl::Stream;
616 void bindStream(egl::Stream *stream);
617 void releaseStream();
618 angle::Result acquireImageFromStream(const Context *context,
619 const egl::Stream::GLTextureDescription &desc);
620 angle::Result releaseImageFromStream(const Context *context);
621
622 void invalidateCompletenessCache() const;
623 angle::Result releaseTexImageInternal(Context *context);
624
625 bool doesSubImageNeedInit(const Context *context,
626 const ImageIndex &imageIndex,
627 const Box &area) const;
628 angle::Result ensureSubImageInitialized(const Context *context,
629 const ImageIndex &imageIndex,
630 const Box &area);
631
632 angle::Result handleMipmapGenerationHint(Context *context, int level);
633
634 void signalDirtyState(size_t dirtyBit);
635
636 TextureState mState;
637 DirtyBits mDirtyBits;
638 rx::TextureImpl *mTexture;
639 angle::ObserverBinding mImplObserver;
640
641 std::string mLabel;
642
643 egl::Surface *mBoundSurface;
644 egl::Stream *mBoundStream;
645
646 // We track all the serials of the Framebuffers this texture is attached to. Note that this
647 // allows duplicates because different ranges of a Texture can be bound to the same Framebuffer.
648 // For the purposes of depth-stencil loops, a simple "isBound" check works fine. For color
649 // attachment Feedback Loop checks we then need to check further to see when a Texture is bound
650 // to mulitple bindings that the bindings don't overlap.
651 static constexpr uint32_t kFastFramebufferSerialCount = 8;
652 angle::FastVector<rx::Serial, kFastFramebufferSerialCount> mBoundFramebufferSerials;
653
654 struct SamplerCompletenessCache
655 {
656 SamplerCompletenessCache();
657
658 // Context used to generate this cache entry
659 ContextID context;
660
661 // All values that affect sampler completeness that are not stored within
662 // the texture itself
663 SamplerState samplerState;
664
665 // Result of the sampler completeness with the above parameters
666 bool samplerComplete;
667 };
668
669 mutable SamplerCompletenessCache mCompletenessCache;
670};
671
672inline bool operator==(const TextureState &a, const TextureState &b)
673{
674 return a.mSwizzleState == b.mSwizzleState && a.mSamplerState == b.mSamplerState &&
675 a.mBaseLevel == b.mBaseLevel && a.mMaxLevel == b.mMaxLevel &&
676 a.mImmutableFormat == b.mImmutableFormat && a.mImmutableLevels == b.mImmutableLevels &&
677 a.mUsage == b.mUsage;
678}
679
680inline bool operator!=(const TextureState &a, const TextureState &b)
681{
682 return !(a == b);
683}
684} // namespace gl
685
686#endif // LIBANGLE_TEXTURE_H_
